Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Nicolás Benasayag
Reviews.Content: Works great in Argentina, 3G works perfectly.Remember that this version doesn't have NFC, the I9070P does.Android 2.3.6.Waiting for the Android 4.1.2 Jelly Bean.

Reviews.Title: 100% smart
Reviews.Author: Carlos Fajardo
Reviews.Content: Very nice phone. Was brandnew i love it run perfect games and itself, and nice price so i recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Product
Reviews.Author: salvador
Reviews.Content: It's like a Galaxy II, just with a little less RAM of memory, but run very decent, don't have any complain I knew what I was buying...

Reviews.Title: Great phone for its price,
Reviews.Author: T. Bowers
Reviews.Content: Great phone, did come in another language but found it easier enough to change to English. Does stuff way better then my iPhone, except sometime the front camera doesn't work with programmers like snap chat and Skype otherwise awesome!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Amanda M.
Reviews.Content: This cellphone is really perfect, it runs fast and it has a very good camera. It met my expectations !!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Nataliya
Reviews.Content: Love this phone a lot.  It has nice design, perfect size and does what I need.  Love it!  Glad that I got it.

Reviews.Title: OUTSTANDING
Reviews.Author: gary j. graham
Reviews.Content: THIS PRODUCT PROVIDED THE NEED AND SERVICE THAT I WAS LOOKING FOR. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO MY FRIENDS.

Reviews.Title: samsung I9070
Reviews.Author: Helvio
Reviews.Content: Is a good cell phone, the battery could have much capacity and be better.Have been a good experience. I like it

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Melquisedec
Reviews.Content: Este Phone es muy bueno, lo recomiendo ampliamente. tiene muy buena respuesta en todo lo que se le demanda. Estoy satisfecho con el trabajo que Samsung ha realizado con este terminal.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung I9070 Galaxy S Advance Quad-band GSM Cell Phone - Unlocked
